name: The Gate of All Nations
description:
I know that one day, we will get to rebuild you
to have your beauty and elegance back. That might sound like a dream, but I know it will come true. For now, I will recreate you in my mind, heart, and soul until that day comes.

The Gate of All Nations
The first NFT of Persepolis NFTs collection
Reconstruction of Gate of All Nations in Persepolis 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿
It was initially Constructed by Achaemenid king "Xerxes I" the successor of the founder of Persepolis "Darius the Great" in 550 BC in Persia.
